pageContext.claim: “George Conway, often referred to as Mr. Kellyanne Conway by those who know him, is VERY jealous of his wife’s success & angry that I, with her help, didn't give him the job he so desperately wanted. I barely know him but just take a look, a stone cold LOSER & husband from hell!”
pageContext.analysis: Conway responded by showing a laudatory letter to him from Trump as well as evidence that he had been offered a senior-level job in the Justice Department, which he turned down. Conway's wife, Trump aide Kellyanne Conway, later confirmed to Fox News on March 31 that her husband "changed his mind" about working for Trump and "withdrew himself from consideration at the White House."
